mapper.select: select cart_quantity from cart where member_num = #{member_num} AND p_code = #{p_code}
mapper.insert: insert into orders(order_code, order_num, member_num, order_date, address_recipent, order_totalQuantity, order_totalPrice, order_usePoint, order_addPoint, order_method, order_status) values(default, #{order_num}, #{member_num}, default, #{address_recipent}, #{order_totalQuantity}, #{order_totalPrice}, #{order_usePoint}, #{order_addPoint}, #{order_method}, '결제 완료')
mapper.select: select order_code from orders where order_num = #{order_num}
mapper.insert: insert into orders_detail(order_detailCode, order_code, p_code, order_quantity, p_price) values(default, #{order_code}, #{p_code}, #{order_quantity}, #{p_price})

insert into delivery(deli_num, order_code, deli_name, deli_tel, deli_address1, deli_address2, deli_address3, deli_request) values(default, #{order_code}, #{address_recipent}, #{address_phone}, #{address_1}, #{address_2}, #{address_3}, #{address_request})
update members set member_point = member_point + #{order_addPoint} where member_num = #{member_num}
update members set member_point = member_point - #{order_usePoint} where member_num = #{member_num}
